name: Yuri S.
bio: Hi, I'm Yuri. I've been teaching English for over 20 years. I create my own materials and teach my students how to take control of their English learning. My approach is unconventional, but it gets results. It's built on neuroscience and decades of practical experience. This is a proven system for mastering real-world English, no matter your level or background. I spent years refining this method. Now it's your turn to use it. I live on Sixth Street in Austin, Texas. I hold a Master's degree in Teaching English from Drahomanov National Pedagogical University and a verified Preply Language Teaching Certificate. I've taught over 20,000 one-on-one English lessons on Preply, and just as many off the platform, helping adults master English for work and life.
headline: NeuroMethod Expert | 20+ Years Helping Adults Master English

name: Владислав Б.
bio: Hello! My name is Vladislav. Teaching is my favorite thing. I adore English. It is like native to me. English knowledge helped me negotiate and close deals. I like it when students know and understand their goals and objectives and strive to acquire all the necessary knowledge and improve their abilities to the maximum. I have great experience teaching online and offline. I focus on intensive training not giving the opportunity to fall asleep. I skillfully apply a variety of techniques as well as I use my own ones.
headline: Certified tutor with 14 years of experience

name: Amina K.
bio: Hi! My name is Amina and I've been teaching English with pleasure for 11 years! I have taught in different countries of the world (from Asia to South America), so there is no problem to adapt to the cultural and linguistic characteristics (pronunciation) of any student. I teach both adults and children. According to my methodology, English is not just a set of rules and memorization of words, but an interactive game, promoting knowledge that will last a lifetime. My lessons are held in a friendly atmosphere, will help you overcome the language barrier and you will finally speak.
headline: Certified tutor with 11 years of experience around the world

name: Alina O.
bio: I'm a certified teacher of English, German, Ukrainian, and Russian with 16 years of experience teaching children and adults. I have taught at universities, embassies, and international events. I create personalized, practical, and engaging lessons that make learning enjoyable and effective. Whether you want to speak confidently, excel in exams, or use a language professionally, I provide clear guidance, all the materials you need, and full support every step of the way.
headline: Personalized, Engaging Language Lessons – Speak, Succeed, and Enjoy Learning! 16+ Years Teaching English, German, Ukrainian & Russian

name: Larry B.
bio: Hello there! I am Larry, your expert and experienced English tutor. I help people achieve their goals and improve their lives. I have many years of international experience as a language, legal, and business expert. I am multilingual in English, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, French, and a little bit of German. I have been teaching for over 8 years in different countries, both privately and in the corporate sphere. I have a certificate in TEFL from the London Teacher Training College as well as university degrees in law and management.
headline: Certified TEFL tutor with 8+ years of teaching experience and a business and legal background

name: Сергей Я.
bio: Experienced English language tutor with over 8 years of online teaching experience. Student-centered approach emphasizing personalized instruction. Incorporates textbooks, authentic materials, multimedia, and online tools. Focuses on all four essential language skills: speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
headline: Your tutor of English! Your tutor of Russian!

name: Катерина К.
bio: I have 10 years experience of teaching and I am the author of 2 own programs. One of them is intensive, another is based on business language for global companies. I worked as school teacher, then at University. My longest term of work with English is occupation at international company. I also have a YouTube channel (English formulas).
headline: English language tutor. Ukrainian and Czech language teacher. Specialized in intensive programs.

name: Valery N.
bio: Certified tutor with 30+ years of experience. Author of 4 English textbooks certified by Canadian association of publishers. Worked for publishing houses and business structures of London, Toronto and Chicago. Author of many new methodologies for teaching English. Has a website: englishcourse.com.ua
headline: Please, Follow Me.

name: Andreï G.
bio: I've been teaching languages for over 15 years. I speak six languages fluently and study several more. CELTA certified, CPE C2, IELTS Academic 8.5. Background in International Relations and language education. Lessons focus on communication and confidence, helping students overcome speaking blocks.
headline: Certified language coach for natural and confident communication.

name: Felix A.
bio: 10+ years of experience teaching English as a foreign language with over 13,000 lessons delivered to professionals, entrepreneurs, tech experts, travelers, and IELTS candidates across 40+ countries. Specializes in Business English, Conversational Fluency, English for IT Specialists, IELTS Preparation, and Travel English. TEFL and TESOL certified. Uses the indirect method - students speak, he shapes their language in real time.
headline: Your Expert English Coach for Business, IT, and IELTS | 10+ Years | Speak with Power & Confidence

name: Iryna H.
bio: CELTA, TEFL & TESOL certified teacher with 10 years of teaching experience. Degree in technical translation and international law from National Aviation University. Has taught children as young as 3 and adults from entry-level to proficiency. Adapts methodology to each student's abilities and requirements.
headline: Certified CELTA, TEFL & TESOL tutor with 10 years of experience, Russian and Ukrainian tutor

name: Yuri P.
bio: 15 years of teaching experience. Uses a blended conversational method including mnemonics, visual associations, and reverse synchronous interpreting. Student talk time about 70%. Has taught students from Brazil, South Korea, Egypt, Turkey, and Russia. Also has a quick IELTS preparation program.
headline: TESOL tutor
